channel.title: Connection fetching update stuck paying 2-3m RSGp!
channel.description: Alright so me and a friend set up a dementhium source test. He is hosting from his regular ip he is also portforwarded. But when I run the client it gets stuck at fetching updates. And it just sits there intill he restarted the server then it connected. it does this everytime anyone know? It's a big delay on my part and I need to fix it ASAP
